title: The Warmongers
description: The Yotsuba family is one of the most prestigious households in all of Japan in the year 2050. Hitachi and Miyazaki Yotsuba are the two sons of a government official in Japan, but their political views are what set them apart. When a mysterious man arrives at the Yotsuba household to watch the two boys, Miyazaki is nowhere to be found the next day. A frantic search ensues for the young boy, but it is unsuccessful. When the boy is found, however, chaos erupts. A sketchy woman, a new tsar, and assassination are some of the few things that take Hitachi Yotsuba by storm. The Warmongers is a tale of betrayal, hatred, and sweet revenge. Join the two brothers during their winter months as they strive to be better than each other in terms of warfare and family.
author: Bianca Fanty
